Let's Connect!

Hi! I'm Sanjana.

I am a social & behavioral health communication researcher and practitioner based in Chicago, IL.

Vist my blog

Academia

PhD Candidate, Media, Technology & Society
Northwestern University

My dissertation research focuses on designing and evaluating a conversational agent to support individuals with overactive bladder (i.e., knowledge, motivation, disclosure, decision-making). This work is in collaboration with Renalis, a digital health company creating platforms to improve pelvic health outcomes.

Curriculum Vitae

Industry

Behavioral Research & Strategy Design

My goal is to establish myself as an expert in research & strategy design in the FemTech sector. I am passionate about designing platforms to improve women’s health below the belt (i.e., pelvic, reproductive, maternal, etc).
